PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08232024-06-21PS
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 257, Nova Scotia
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 257 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to Nova Scotia with respect to the interface fires that occurred from May 27 to June 11, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: PROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 257 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to Nova Scotia with respect to the interface fires that occurred from May 27 to June 11, 2023.
